content: Deon Christie You’re preaching to the choir, my friend. I actually wrote an article in late February about this: https://medium.com/the-mission/do-it-because-you-believe-in-it-f6aa475ddb09. It is not easy to be original and unique. Which is why so many people take the easy way out. But that’s also why it’s hard to find great content. I humbly hope all of us are doing our part. Thanks for reading!
